name: Douglass Bullet
text: Activate: Main — Once Per Turn — DON!! -4 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Rest up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. Then, this Character gains Double Attack during this turn. (This card deals 2 damage.)

effect.text: Rest up to 2 opponent Characters with cost 6 or less. Then gain Double Attack this turn.
